title: The Fallen
description: An army of fallen angels walks the Earth, blinded to their pasts. Scattered and lost, the creatures call themselves hunters as they fight evil. To find their way back into Heaven, the fallen must unravel the mystery of what they are and how they lost their grace. The first step on their road to redemption is stopping a rogue hunter.A year into her life as a hunter, Lila fears nothing. That is, until she receives a vision from the Lord to hunt down a fierce hunter gone rogue. Years earlier, Joaquin was merely a lost man looking for salvation. The feelings awakened inside the assassin after his sign from God will lead him to unbearable suffering and a battle with Lila.
author: Dakota Shepherd
